definitions: To provide (a computer or other machine) with coded instructions for the automatic performance of a particular task.
To arrange for (something) to happen or be done according to a plan or schedule.
To cause (a person or animal) to behave in a particular way through training or conditioning.
examples: The robot was programmed to assemble the parts.
The concert was programmed for next month.
He was programmed from childhood to be competitive.
